entry.title: DIPLOMAX ADVANTAGE — the PrimeTime Learning GUARANTEE
entry.content:
PrimeTime Learning has offered over 36,000 DIPLOMAX review classes since 1995 in English 30, Math 30-1 and Math 30-2, Biology 30, Chemistry 30, Physics 30, Science 30, and Social Studies 30-1. Highly qualified instructors have helped students who have taken DIPLOMAX review classes raise their diploma mark anywhere from 5-20% over their term mark! Not only is the student satisfaction rate at 94%, but DIPLOMAX offers you the Prime Time Leaning Guarantee.

The PrimeTime Learning Guarantee assures you of the following.

  • Value – When you enroll in DIPLOMAX you receive a fully targeted review, practical test writing strategies, and a comprehensive Study Notes package for that subject.
  • Flexibility – When you enroll in DIPLOMAX and cannot attend all scheduled classes, or if you find you need more help in the same course, you can access subsequent session classes in the same course at no additional cost.
  • Satisfaction – If you have previously taken DIPLOMAX and decide to rewrite that diploma exam, you can take the same course again for free.

Check out the DIPLOMAX January schedule on the web site www.primetimelearning.ca and get immediate access to your complimentary Study Notes package when you complete your registration.

If you are serious about your success on the diploma exams – DIPLOMAX is here to help you succeed!

entry.title: Diplomax Is Going Social
entry.content:
Thinking about post-secondary studies? Trying to qualify for a quota faculty? Looking at applying for a scholarship? Worrying about getting your high school diploma? You need to check out DIPLOMAX – your premium choice in diploma exam prep!

Follow DIPLOMAX on Facebook and on Twitter to get up-to-date information on DIPLOMAX review classes.

Stay tuned to social media to get:

  • tips and strategies on how to maximize your performance on the diploma exams
  • comprehensive Study Notes package for each course – delivered electronically to your home at the time of online registration
  • practice questions and complete solutions for Math30-1 and 30-2, Biology 30, Chemistry 30 , Physics 30, Science 30, English 30-1, and Social Studies 30-1
  • techniques for dealing with exam anxiety
  • practical test writing strategies – including calculator ‘tricks’
  • strategies for answering multiple choice questions
  • tips for writing strong thesis statements, essays, and personal responses
  • comprehension clues to decode meaning
  • effective study tips
  • how to prepare for an exam; how to write an exam
  • PrimeTime Learning Guarantee for DIPLOMAX review classes

If you are serious about your success on the diploma exams – DIPLOMAX is here to help you succeed!
